title: Tech Stock Rally Loses Steam in Afternoon Trading: Markets Wrap
description: (Bloomberg) -- The rally in tech stocks took a breather as equities cooled after touching record highs amid another round of big-ticket artificial intelligence deals and partnerships. Treasuries and the dollar slumped as a US government shutdown extended for a third day.

title: AI bubble warnings grow louder: Investors sound alarm on sky
description: The AI boom has dominated headlines for months, but a growing chorus of influential voices is starting to sound uneasy. What began as a caution from OpenAI CEO Sam Altman in August has turned into a broader debate about whether the frenzy around artificial intelligence is starting to look like the late-1990s dot-com bubble. title: European Stocks Log Biggest Weekly Gain Since May on AI Optimism
description: European stocks notched their strongest week since May, gaining for a sixth day in a row amid investor optimism over artificial intelligence developments.
content:

title: Bezos says AI spending boom is a bubble that will pay off
description: Amazon.com Inc. Chairman Jeff Bezos said that the spending on artificial intelligence resembles an "industrial bubble" that could lead to lost investment but will also make society better off.
content:
